changes.change: Added code for IOS 10 (IOS 10 support is BETA)
Fixed ringtones not playing for calls
Fixed import not running on first start of Preferences
Removed HUD
Added a lot more error handling
Added remote logging opt-in
Improved stability and reliability of ringtone importing
Imports are now running in a background thread to improve UI responsiveness
Fixed an error with permissions on tweak data files which caused multiple imports, no imports and other weird bugs
Added a lot more logging and logging to file (warning: only use for short periods if you have a problem, the file can get big)
Added code that runs on first run and removes all duplicated ringtones and makes sure needed files and folders exist.
Fixed an error when that occurs the Ringtone directory does not already exist
Fixed a bug where it required a restart of Preferences to run import again.
Fixed respring button
Minor code cleanup
Removed debug output
Added contact buttons to preference pane
Bugfixes
Added image to ringtone list
Bugfixes
Initial Beta Release
